tier_4_procedural.case_title: Abdulwafa Abubakhar Khan & Anr vs. The State of Maharashtra
tier_4_procedural.court_name: High Court of Judicature at Bombay
tier_4_procedural.acts_and_sections: Section 392 read with Section 34 of I.P.C.

residual_details.additional_facts: The appellants were sentenced to R.I. for three years each and to pay a fine of Rs.500/-. The sentence was reduced to the period already undergone by them. Appellant No.2 had been in custody for more than two and a half years, and Appellant No.1 had been in custody for about a year.
